document_data.name: House of the High Councillor
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the High Councillor''' was the traditional home of [[Mistledale]]'s ruler or High Councillor.
document_data.Location: The home was located in the southeast section of Ashabenford in Mistledale.{{Cite interactive atlas|3800 Ashabenford}}
document_data.Activities: Given its spacious interior, the home was also used by the [[Council of Six (Mistledale)|Council of Six]] for meetings.
document_data.Inhabitants: The High Councillor of Mistledale in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, was [[Haresk Malorn]].
